snippet: The woman who backed out of her adoption of a 7-year-old Russian boy by putting him on a plane to Moscow by himself has lost her bid to keep from paying $150,000 in child support.
abstract: Torry Hansen, the woman who backed out of her adoption of a 7-year-old Russian boy by putting him on a plane to Moscow by himself, loses her bid to keep from paying $150,000 in child support.
lead_paragraph: The woman who backed out of her adoption of a 7-year-old Russian boy by putting him on a plane to Moscow by himself has lost her bid to keep from paying $150,000 in child support.

headline.main: Tennessee: Ex-Adoptive Mother Must Pay Support
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Ex-Adoptive Mother Must Pay Support
